headline: Verizon aims to expand FWA pitch via Starry purchase
summary: Verizon’s planned acquisition of Starry is an effort to buy the tech acumen and architecture to unlock some costly high-band spectrum resources with enough efficiency to see a profit.

headline: 3 Cash-Producing Stocks We Approach with Caution
summary: While strong cash flow is a key indicator of stability, it doesn’t always translate to superior returns. Some cash-heavy businesses struggle with inefficient spending, slowing demand, or weak competitive positioning.
